K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-015:30a-0: @30a / /sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-015:30a-1: na mo ratna shi khi ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-015:30a-3: aarha te samyaksam bud dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-015:30a-5: ratne ratne ratne shi khi ne sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-015:30a-6: 'chi ba'i che dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-015:30a-7: 'chi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lhar skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-088-015:30a-8: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs so //
